Much like the rest of its porcine kin, the Gourmet harbors a brutal ferocity with a combination of debilitating strikes and devastating blows. The culinary skills it has developed can be witnessed in combat, peppering foes with attacks in preparation for a final savory onslaught of violence. Ensuring the customer is satisfied is critical for any chef, and the Gourmet is proficient at supporting allies so they may partake in the feast as well.

Wielding massive cooking implements, the Gourmet is always ready to prepare a new meal from the remains of anything unfortunate enough to be considered fresh ingredients. While an apron does not provide much defense from attack, the swine's massive bulk ensures it will outlast any and all dining confrontation.

The swine's frightening visage may be oppressive and its methods unnerving at best, but there is no denying the exquisite results of its gastronomical skills. With only a makeshift kitchen, the Gourmet can prepare a hearty feast that can bolster the endurance of all willing to partake. Just don't ask what is in it...
"Me hate swine. They eat FILTH. Me is COOK!"
Say pal, you don't look so good.
A hearty meal with a bit of everything! The sheer amount will leave one sluggish after consuming.
Have a taste of the wicked power over life your foes wield, however brittle it may leave you feeling.
A simple meal lacking robust ingredients, but the quality of what has been utilized fills one with a hardy sensation.
The sharp and savory flavor inspires enjoyers into doubling their efforts to procure more!
The bewitching tastes of the deep give adventurers an appreciation for the quiet and safety it provides.
An enriching meal from the finest cut of swine. It will leave you craving more!
For those with an adventurous palate, the swine's appendages make for an exhilarating treat.
This humble treat will attune your senses to the wild granting you an excessive level of focus.
Have a taste of the infamous Hag's very own recipe! Bolster your might and give in to the wild's influence!
Have a taste of the infamous Hag's very own recipe! Bolster your might and give in to the wild's influence!
A bloostuffed meal popular among the Crimson Elite, this has an empowering flavor for those afflicted by the Curse.
This cocktail entices all enjoyers into a frenzy at the sight of blood and further enhances the potency of those already Cursed.

Assim como o resto de seus parentes suínos, o Gourmet abriga uma ferocidade brutal com uma junção de golpes debilitantes e devastadores. As habilidades culinárias desenvolvidas por ele são testemunhadas em combate. Ele bombardeia os inimigos com ataques preparados para um saboroso banquete violento. Garantir a satisfação do cliente é fundamental para qualquer chef, e Gourmet é excelente em garantir que aliados participem do banquete.

Empunhando enormes utensílios de cozinha, o Gourmet está sempre pronto para preparar uma nova refeição dos restos de qualquer coisa infeliz o suficiente para ser considerada um fresco ingrediente. Embora um avental não forneça muita proteção contra ataques, o enorme volume do suíno garante que ele sobreviverá a todo e qualquer confronto no jantar.

A aparência assustadora do porco pode ser opressiva, seus métodos, na melhor das hipóteses, enervantes, mas não há como negar os excelentes resultados de suas habilidades gastronômicas. Com apenas uma cozinha improvisada, o Gourmet pode preparar um farto banquete para reforçar a resiliência de todos os que desejam participar. Só não pergunte do que é feito...
"Mim odiar porco. Eles comer porcaria. Mim ser Cozinheiro!"
Fala tu, você não parece muito bem.
Uma refeição farta e com um pouco de tudo! A grande quantidade deixará a pessoa devagar depois de consumir.
Experimente o poder perverso que seus inimigos exercem sobre a vida, por mais frágil que isso possa fazer você se sentir.
Uma refeição simples, sem ingredientes robustos, mas a qualidade do que foi utilizado dá uma sensação potente.
O sabor forte e cheiroso inspira quem aprecia a dobrarem seus esforços para comer mais!
Os sabores encantadores das profundezas dão aos aventureiros uma apreciação pela tranquilidade e segurança que eles proporcionam.
Uma refeição enriquecedora proveniente da parte de suíno. Isso vai fazer você querer mais!
Para quem tem um paladar aventureiro, os apêndices do porco são um deleite estimulante.
Esta humilde guloseima irá sintonizar seus sentidos com a natureza, garantindo-lhe um nível excessivo de concentração.
Experimente a receita da infame Bruxa! Reforce seu bucho e ceda à influência da natureza!
Experimente a receita da infame Bruxa! Reforce seu bucho e ceda à influência da natureza!
Uma refeição recheada, muito popular entre a Elite Carmesim, tem um sabor excelente para aqueles afetados pela Maldição.
Este coquetel leva todos os seus apreciadores ao frenesi se verem sangue e aumenta ainda mais a potência daqueles que já estão amaldiçoados..

Apreciar culinariamente essas feras permite uma melhor compreensão de como enfrentá-las em combate.

Much like the rest of its porcine kin, the Gourmet harbors a brutal ferocity with a combination of debilitating strikes and devastating blows. The culinary skills it has developed can be witnessed in combat, peppering foes with attacks in preparation for a final savory onslaught of violence. Ensuring the customer is satisfied is critical for any chef, and the Gourmet is proficient at supporting allies so they may partake in the feast as well.

Wielding massive cooking implements, the Gourmet is always ready to prepare a new meal from the remains of anything unfortunate enough to be considered fresh ingredients. While an apron does not provide much defense from attack, the swine's massive bulk ensures it will outlast any and all dining confrontation.

The swine's frightening visage may be oppressive and its methods unnerving at best, but there is no denying the exquisite results of its gastronomical skills. With only a makeshift kitchen, the Gourmet can prepare a hearty feast that can bolster the endurance of all willing to partake. Just don't ask what is in it...
"Me hate swine. They eat FILTH. Me is COOK!"
Say pal, you don't look so good.
A hearty meal with a bit of everything! The sheer amount will leave one sluggish after consuming.
Have a taste of the wicked power over life your foes wield, however brittle it may leave you feeling.
A simple meal lacking robust ingredients, but the quality of what has been utilized fills one with a hardy sensation.
The sharp and savory flavor inspires enjoyers into doubling their efforts to procure more!
The bewitching tastes of the deep give adventurers an appreciation for the quiet and safety it provides.
An enriching meal from the finest cut of swine. It will leave you craving more!
For those with an adventurous palate, the swine's appendages make for an exhilarating treat.
This humble treat will attune your senses to the wild granting you an excessive level of focus.
Have a taste of the infamous Hag's very own recipe! Bolster your might and give in to the wild's influence!

Much like the rest of its porcine kin, the Gourmet harbors a brutal ferocity with a combination of debilitating strikes and devastating blows. The culinary skills it has developed can be witnessed in combat, peppering foes with attacks in preparation for a final savory onslaught of violence. Ensuring the customer is satisfied is critical for any chef, and the Gourmet is proficient at supporting allies so they may partake in the feast as well.

Wielding massive cooking implements, the Gourmet is always ready to prepare a new meal from the remains of anything unfortunate enough to be considered fresh ingredients. While an apron does not provide much defense from attack, the swine's massive bulk ensures it will outlast any and all dining confrontation.

The swine's frightening visage may be oppressive and its methods unnerving at best, but there is no denying the exquisite results of its gastronomical skills. With only a makeshift kitchen, the Gourmet can prepare a hearty feast that can bolster the endurance of all willing to partake. Just don't ask what is in it...
"Me hate swine. They eat FILTH. Me is COOK!"
Say pal, you don't look so good.
A hearty meal with a bit of everything! The sheer amount will leave one sluggish after consuming.
Have a taste of the wicked power over life your foes wield, however brittle it may leave you feeling.
A simple meal lacking robust ingredients, but the quality of what has been utilized fills one with a hardy sensation.
The sharp and savory flavor inspires enjoyers into doubling their efforts to procure more!
The bewitching tastes of the deep give adventurers an appreciation for the quiet and safety it provides.
An enriching meal from the finest cut of swine. It will leave you craving more!
For those with an adventurous palate, the swine's appendages make for an exhilarating treat.
This humble treat will attune your senses to the wild granting you an excessive level of focus.

Much like the rest of its porcine kin, the Gourmet harbors a brutal ferocity with a combination of debilitating strikes and devastating blows. The culinary skills it has developed can be witnessed in combat, peppering foes with attacks in preparation for a final savory onslaught of violence. Ensuring the customer is satisfied is critical for any chef, and the Gourmet is proficient at supporting allies so they may partake in the feast as well.

Wielding massive cooking implements, the Gourmet is always ready to prepare a new meal from the remains of anything unfortunate enough to be considered fresh ingredients. While an apron does not provide much defense from attack, the swine's massive bulk ensures it will outlast any and all dining confrontation.

The swine's frightening visage may be oppressive and its methods unnerving at best, but there is no denying the exquisite results of its gastronomical skills. With only a makeshift kitchen, the Gourmet can prepare a hearty feast that can bolster the endurance of all willing to partake. Just don't ask what is in it...
"Me hate swine. They eat FILTH. Me is COOK!"
Say pal, you don't look so good.
A hearty meal with a bit of everything! The sheer amount will leave one sluggish after consuming.
Have a taste of the wicked power over life your foes wield, however brittle it may leave you feeling.
A simple meal lacking robust ingredients, but the quality of what has been utilized fills one with a hardy sensation.
The sharp and savory flavor inspires enjoyers into doubling their efforts to procure more!
The bewitching tastes of the deep give adventurers an appreciation for the quiet and safety it provides.
An enriching meal from the finest cut of swine. It will leave you craving more!

This humble treat will attune your senses to the wild granting you an excessive level of focus.
Have a taste of the infamous Hag's very own recipe! Bolster your might and give in to the wild's influence!
Have a taste of the infamous Hag's very own recipe! Bolster your might and give in to the wild's influence!
A bloostuffed meal popular among the Crimson Elite, this has an empowering flavor for those afflicted by the Curse.
This cocktail entices all enjoyers into a frenzy at the sight of blood and further enhances the potency of those already Cursed.

Much like the rest of its porcine kin, the Gourmet harbors a brutal ferocity with a combination of debilitating strikes and devastating blows. The culinary skills it has developed can be witnessed in combat, peppering foes with attacks in preparation for a final savory onslaught of violence. Ensuring the customer is satisfied is critical for any chef, and the Gourmet is proficient at supporting allies so they may partake in the feast as well.

Wielding massive cooking implements, the Gourmet is always ready to prepare a new meal from the remains of anything unfortunate enough to be considered fresh ingredients. While an apron does not provide much defense from attack, the swine's massive bulk ensures it will outlast any and all dining confrontation.

The swine's frightening visage may be oppressive and its methods unnerving at best, but there is no denying the exquisite results of its gastronomical skills. With only a makeshift kitchen, the Gourmet can prepare a hearty feast that can bolster the endurance of all willing to partake. Just don't ask what is in it...
"Me hate swine. They eat FILTH. Me is COOK!"
Say pal, you don't look so good.
A hearty meal with a bit of everything! The sheer amount will leave one sluggish after consuming.
Have a taste of the wicked power over life your foes wield, however brittle it may leave you feeling.
A simple meal lacking robust ingredients, but the quality of what has been utilized fills one with a hardy sensation.
The sharp and savory flavor inspires enjoyers into doubling their efforts to procure more!
The bewitching tastes of the deep give adventurers an appreciation for the quiet and safety it provides.
An enriching meal from the finest cut of swine. It will leave you craving more!
For those with an adventurous palate, the swine's appendages make for an exhilarating treat.
This humble treat will attune your senses to the wild granting you an excessive level of focus.
Have a taste of the infamous Hag's very own recipe! Bolster your might and give in to the wild's influence!
Have a taste of the infamous Hag's very own recipe! Bolster your might and give in to the wild's influence!
A bloostuffed meal popular among the Crimson Elite, this has an empowering flavor for those afflicted by the Curse.
This cocktail entices all enjoyers into a frenzy at the sight of blood and further enhances the potency of those already Cursed.

Much like the rest of its porcine kin, the Gourmet harbors a brutal ferocity with a combination of debilitating strikes and devastating blows. The culinary skills it has developed can be witnessed in combat, peppering foes with attacks in preparation for a final savory onslaught of violence. Ensuring the customer is satisfied is critical for any chef, and the Gourmet is proficient at supporting allies so they may partake in the feast as well.

Wielding massive cooking implements, the Gourmet is always ready to prepare a new meal from the remains of anything unfortunate enough to be considered fresh ingredients. While an apron does not provide much defense from attack, the swine's massive bulk ensures it will outlast any and all dining confrontation.

The swine's frightening visage may be oppressive and its methods unnerving at best, but there is no denying the exquisite results of its gastronomical skills. With only a makeshift kitchen, the Gourmet can prepare a hearty feast that can bolster the endurance of all willing to partake. Just don't ask what is in it...
"Me hate swine. They eat FILTH. Me is COOK!"
Say pal, you don't look so good.
A hearty meal with a bit of everything! The sheer amount will leave one sluggish after consuming.

Much like the rest of its porcine kin, the Gourmet harbors a brutal ferocity with a combination of debilitating strikes and devastating blows. The culinary skills it has developed can be witnessed in combat, peppering foes with attacks in preparation for a final savory onslaught of violence. Ensuring the customer is satisfied is critical for any chef, and the Gourmet is proficient at supporting allies so they may partake in the feast as well.

Wielding massive cooking implements, the Gourmet is always ready to prepare a new meal from the remains of anything unfortunate enough to be considered fresh ingredients. While an apron does not provide much defense from attack, the swine's massive bulk ensures it will outlast any and all dining confrontation.

The swine's frightening visage may be oppressive and its methods unnerving at best, but there is no denying the exquisite results of its gastronomical skills. With only a makeshift kitchen, the Gourmet can prepare a hearty feast that can bolster the endurance of all willing to partake. Just don't ask what is in it...
"Me hate swine. They eat FILTH. Me is COOK!"
Say pal, you don't look so good.
A hearty meal with a bit of everything! The sheer amount will leave one sluggish after consuming.
Have a taste of the wicked power over life your foes wield, however brittle it may leave you feeling.
A simple meal lacking robust ingredients, but the quality of what has been utilized fills one with a hardy sensation.
The sharp and savory flavor inspires enjoyers into doubling their efforts to procure more!
The bewitching tastes of the deep give adventurers an appreciation for the quiet and safety it provides.
An enriching meal from the finest cut of swine. It will leave you craving more!
For those with an adventurous palate, the swine's appendages make for an exhilarating treat.
This humble treat will attune your senses to the wild granting you an excessive level of focus.
Have a taste of the infamous Hag's very own recipe! Bolster your might and give in to the wild's influence!
Have a taste of the infamous Hag's very own recipe! Bolster your might and give in to the wild's influence!
A bloostuffed meal popular among the Crimson Elite, this has an empowering flavor for those afflicted by the Curse.
This cocktail entices all enjoyers into a frenzy at the sight of blood and further enhances the potency of those already Cursed.

Как и остальные его сородичи-свиньи, Гурман обладает жестокой свирепостью и сочетает в себе изнурительные атаки и сокрушительные удары. Кулинарные навыки, которые он развил, можно наблюдать в бою, когда он атакует врагов, готовясь к финальному пикантному натиску насилия. Убежденность, что клиент доволен, крайне важно для любого шеф-повара, а Гурман умеет поддерживать союзников, чтобы они тоже могли принять участие в пиршестве.

Обладая массивными кухонными принадлежностями, Гурман всегда готов приготовить новое блюдо из остатков всего, что достаточно неудачно, чтобы считаться свежими ингредиентами. Хотя фартук не обеспечивает надежной защиты от нападения, массивная масса свиньи гарантирует, что она переживет любую конфронтацию за столом.

Устрашающий вид свиньи может быть угнетающим, а ее методы в лучшем случае нервирующими, но нельзя отрицать изысканные результаты ее гастрономических навыков. Имея лишь импровизированную кухню, Гурман может приготовить сытный пир, который укрепит выносливость всех желающих. Только не спрашивайте, что там...
"Моя ненавидеть свиней. Они жрать ГРЯЗЬ. МОЯ БЫТЬ ПОВАР!"
Эй, приятель, ты не так хорошо выглядишь.
Сытный обед со всем понемногу! После употребления такого количества человек становится вялым.
Почувствуйте вкус злой власти над жизнью, которой обладают ваши враги, какой бы хрупкой она ни оставляла вас.
Простая еда, в которой отсутствуют надежные ингредиенты, но качество использованного наполняет ощущение выносливости.
Острый и пикантный вкус вдохновляет любителей удвоить свои усилия, чтобы получить больше!
Чарующие вкусы глубин позволяют искателям приключений оценить тишину и безопасность, которые они обеспечивают.
Обогащающий обед из отборного отруба свиньи. Это заставит вас жаждать большего!

Это скромное лакомство настроит ваши чувства на дикую природу, предоставив вам чрезмерный уровень концентрации.

Этот коктейль приводит всех любителей в безумие при виде крови и еще больше усиливает силу тех, кто уже проклят.

就像它的其他猪人亲戚一样，猪人美食家也有着残暴与凶猛，既有虚弱敌人的打击，也有毁灭肉体的打击。我们可以在战斗中看到它所拥有的烹饪技能，它向敌人发起攻击，为最后美味的毁灭打击做好准备。确保顾客的满意对任何厨师来说都至关重要，而猪人美食家擅长支援队友，因此他们也可以参与这场盛宴。
猪人美食家拥有巨大的烹饪工具，随时准备用任何不幸的食材做一顿新饭。虽然它的围裙不能提供太多的防御，但猪人的巨大身材确保了它能在任何与它的食材的对抗中生存下来。
这只猪人狰狞的外貌可能会让人感到紧张压抑，它的烹饪方式充其量也会让人不安，但不可否认的是，它的烹饪技巧带来的是精致的效果。只要有一个临时性的厨房，猪人美食家就可以准备一顿丰盛的盛宴，增强所有愿意尝鲜的人的耐力。只要别问食物里面到底有什么……
最凶猛的野兽也会因长久的饥饿而倒下……但愿它能享受这最后一餐吧。

Al igual que el resto de sus congéneres porcinos, el Gourmet alberga una ferocidad brutal con una combinación de golpes debilitadores y devastadores. Las habilidades culinarias que ha desarrollado pueden verse en combate, acribillando a los enemigos con ataques en preparación para un sabroso ataque final de violencia. Asegurarse de que el cliente quede satisfecho es fundamental para cualquier chef, y el Gourmet es experto en apoyar a los aliados para que también puedan participar en el festín.

Armado con enormes utensilios de cocina, el Gourmet siempre está listo para preparar una nueva comida a partir de los restos de cualquier cosa lo suficientemente desafortunada como para ser considerada ingrediente fresco. Aunque el delantal no le defiende mucho de los ataques, su enorme corpulencia le permite sobrevivir a cualquier enfrentamiento gastronómico.

Puede que el espantoso rostro del cerdo sea opresivo y sus métodos, en el mejor de los casos, desconcertantes, pero no se pueden negar los exquisitos resultados de sus habilidades gastronómicas. Con sólo una cocina improvisada, el Gourmet puede preparar un suculento festín que puede reforzar la resistencia de todos los que estén dispuestos a participar. Eso sí, no preguntes qué lleva...
Cuchillo sin Filo y Mazo Improvisado

Much like the rest of its porcine kin, the Gourmet harbors a brutal ferocity with a combination of debilitating strikes and devastating blows. The culinary skills it has developed can be witnessed in combat, peppering foes with attacks in preparation for a final savory onslaught of violence. Ensuring the customer is satisfied is critical for any chef, and the Gourmet is proficient at supporting allies so they may partake in the feast as well.

Wielding massive cooking implements, the Gourmet is always ready to prepare a new meal from the remains of anything unfortunate enough to be considered fresh ingredients. While an apron does not provide much defense from attack, the swine's massive bulk ensures it will outlast any and all dining confrontation.

The swine's frightening visage may be oppressive and its methods unnerving at best, but there is no denying the exquisite results of its gastronomical skills. With only a makeshift kitchen, the Gourmet can prepare a hearty feast that can bolster the endurance of all willing to partake. Just don't ask what is in it...
"Me hate swine. They eat FILTH. Me is COOK!"

An enriching meal from the finest cut of swine. It will leave you craving more!
For those with an adventurous palate, the swine's appendages make for an exhilarating treat.
This humble treat will attune your senses to the wild granting you an excessive level of focus.
Have a taste of the infamous Hag's very own recipe! Bolster your might and give in to the wild's influence!

A bloostuffed meal popular among the Crimson Elite, this has an empowering flavor for those afflicted by the Curse.
This cocktail entices all enjoyers into a frenzy at the sight of blood and further enhances the potency of those already Cursed.
